name: Renowned Explorers: International Society
summary: In this strategic rogue-like you become a famous expedition leader in the 19th century. You form your own crew with the skills and personality to discover legendary treasures, while exploring randomized locations and stories on every new adventure.
info:
• 中文名: 著名探险家：国际社会
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SLG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2015年9月2日
  • 开发: Abbey Games
  • 发行: Abbey Games
